room_title: Escape room "Misfortune" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: We had 4 people in the Fortune Teller Room. We had zero clue how to start. The hints that popped up on the screen were clever! So riveting! So many things that shocked me! So fun! I wish I could do this every weekend!

room_title: Escape room "Misfortune" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: Absolutely loved the tricks, change-ups, and mystery trying to reverse the curse! Can't wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Misfortune" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: We've done two rooms so far: the Saloon and Miss Fortune, and while they were both amazing, we did like Miss Fortune more. It was a great room for our group of four to do as a family (kids are 9 and 11). The employees are great and take the time to talk about your game after you've finished and answer any remaining questions you may have. We will definitely be going back!
